title: Cant type in password on the login screen
body:
Cant type in anything on the login screen, nor change the user name.
My keyboard is wroking well

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you're still experiencing this issue could you please try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps at all.
